version_description:
Hi everyone, I am Girl-X. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
--- New content ----
1.Add FU-sets with Chinese characteristics
2.Added a cute zombie suit
3. A gorgeous "Dancing Girl" set has been added, but the way to get the plan brother has not yet thought about it ^-^.

--- Optimization----
1. Reduced the difficulty level for novice players.
2.Optimized the visual effects of the level.
3. Optimized theever guide level and increased the weak guide level.
4.Optimized the performance of APP

Hi everyone, I am Girl-X. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
--- New content ----
1.Add FU-sets with Chinese characteristics
2.Added a cute zombie suit
3. A gorgeous "Dancing Girl" set has been added, but the way to get the plan brother has not yet thought about it ^-^.

--- Optimization----
1. Reduced the difficulty level for novice players.
2.Optimized the visual effects of the level.
3. Optimized theever guide level and increased the weak guide level.
4.Optimized the performance of APP

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Fix the bug that can't enter the game. Bow again and again to apologize to everyone
2. Fix the problem that the weapon interface, set interface and list in Portuguese are disordered and the weapon becomes larger. Maybe I didn't bring glasses that day ~

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Fix the bug that can't enter the game. Bow again and again to apologize to everyone
2. Fix the problem that the weapon interface, set interface and list in Portuguese are disordered and the weapon becomes larger. Maybe I didn't bring glasses that day ~

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Added a new weapon: Gem Beauty
2. Corrected several translation and grammatical problems in some languages
3. Added rewards for registered account

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Optimized novice guidance
2. Optimized UI interface
3. Optimized the unlocking steps of the settlement interface
4. Changed the samurai suit to conditional unlock

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Optimized novice guidance
2. Optimized UI interface
3. Optimized the unlocking steps of the settlement interface
4. Changed the samurai suit to conditional unlock

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Added novice gift pack cat claw weapon
2. Added limited-time promotional pirate clothing
3. New three-in-one set combination
4. Adjusted the sensitivity issue mentioned by the players

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Added novice gift pack cat claw weapon
2. Added limited-time promotional pirate clothing
3. New three-in-one set combination
4. Adjusted the sensitivity issue mentioned by the players

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Added AIhelp customer service system: You can click the customer service avatar in the setting interface to enter the customer service system. If you have any questions, please consult us in the customer service system!
2. Fixed the issue of interstitial ads mentioned by players.
3.Fixed the network problem mentioned by players after the end of each round
4. Follow our Facebook to get rewards

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:
1. Added new suits: Baby Dinosaur Suit, Code-V Suit and Jewel Set.
2. Added Super Box, in which new suits are possible!
3. Added try-on function for hairstyles.
4. Optimized the levels scenes.

1. Added new suits: Baby Dinosaur Suit, Code-V Suit and Jewel Set.
2. Added Super Box, in which new suits are possible!
3. Added try-on function for hairstyles.
4. Optimized the levels scenes.

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

- Summer Event
Summer Shop is open! Yummy ice creams, surprise summer gifts, brand new summer suits,
and novel weapon — a gorgeous umbrella! Come and enjoy your cool summer~

- Limited-time discount for suits
Every day there will be one suit provided with limited-time discount.

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

- Summer Event
Summer Shop is open! Yummy ice creams, surprise summer gifts, brand new summer suits,
and novel weapon — a gorgeous umbrella! Come and enjoy your cool summer~

- Limited-time discount for suits
Every day there will be one suit provided with limited-time discount.

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Optimized sensitivity
2. Added bloom
3. Added the function to use diamonds to skip the free coin countdown
4. Optimized the game experience

The summer event is coming to an end, please hurry up~

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Optimized sensitivity
2. Added bloom
3. Added the function to use diamonds to skip the free coin countdown
4. Optimized the game experience

The summer event is coming to an end, please hurry up~

Trick or Treat! Halloween is coming!!!

Colorful Candies, Mysterious Pumpkins, and brand new Halloween Suits are waiting for you!
-Added 1 weapon: Ghost Baby
-Added 2 Suits: the noble Charlie and the cool Ghost Hunter set
-Added 3 Special Gift Packages: help you collect more Candies faster!
-Added 4 Halloween Icon: log in or Participat in event to get them!

The Halloween event is limited to 14 days.Don't miss it~

Jingle bells, Jingle bells, Jingle all the way! Christmas is coming!
Customized Christmas scenes, grand new Christmas Events, and exquisite Santa's gifts are waiting for you!

Christmas Event 1: Battle Pass
Christmas Event 2: Limited time snowman chest event

Rewards list:
-Added 2 Weapons: Captain Boby & Christmas Tree
-Added 2 Suits: Snowman Set & Christmas Set
-Added 3 Gift Packs: help you collect all kinds of gloves faster!
-Added 3 Icons: log in or participat in event to get them!
-Added 6 Lips: 3 lips each for black skin and blue zombie skin

The Christmas Event is limited to 14 days. Come and join it!

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Optimized the novice guide
2. Optimized the game experience
3. Optimized the UI

Hi everyone, I am Doris. Let me introduce the updates of this version for you:

1. Optimized the novice guide
2. Optimized the game experience
3. Optimized the UI

Most popular Battle Pass event is coming!
The theme of the suit for this event is the professional series-SPARK. Brand new style, hope you like it!
And the duration of the event is 14 days, so don't miss it~
In addition, the Halloween set and Christmas set are also back, which can be obtained through the Super Box lottery.

Moreover, we have fixed the white screen, flashback, and inability to open the game that players mentioned.
